config.option.show_schedule_key.name: Show NPC Schedules key
config.option.use_address.name: Use address in schedules
config.option.use_address.description: Use Pelican Town address instead of "Home of ..." for schedule entries i.e. "2 Willow Lane" instead of "Home of Emily & Haley". (Changes may not take effect until the next day.)
config.option.disable_hover.name: Hide details on hover
config.option.disable_hover.description: Don't show tile, facing direction, and animation info on hover.
config.option.use_large_font.name: Use larger font on details page
config.option.use_large_font.description: Use a larger text size on the Schedule Details page. (If enabled text may get cut off depending on the name of the location.)
config.option.sort_options.name: NPC Sort Order
config.option.sort_options.description: The order in which to sort the NPCs when viewing their schedules.
config.option.only_show_met_npcs.name: Hide NPCs you haven't met
config.option.only_show_met_npcs.descrip: Hides NPCs you haven't talked to before in the list.
config.option.only_show_socializable_npc: Hides NPCs you can't socialize with (ex: Gunther or Sandy before the bus is repaired) in the list.
config.option.ignored_npcs.name: Ignored NPCs
config.option.ignored_npcs.description: A comma-separated list of NPC names to hide in the list. Prepending a name with "^" will match any names that start with that value (ex: "^Ha" will hide both Haley and Harvey)
error.mismatch_mods: Warning! You and the host player have different mods/mod versions which can affect the accuracy of the schedules. See SMAPI log for more details.
error.mismatch_game_version: Warning! You and the host player have different game versions which can affect the accuracy of the schedules.
ignoring_schedule_today: Ignoring their schedule today. Current location:
not_following_schedule_today: No schedule for today. Current location:
